SEARCH
Package soundPlayback

Interface PlaybackProgressMonitor

public interface PlaybackProgressMonitor
Receives notificaitons from the playback system detailing how far playback has got in viewer mode.
Author:
Doug Gillespie

  • Method Details

    • setProgress

      void setProgress(int channels, long timeMillis, double percent)
      Notify progress during playback in viewer mode.

      The times are given in two ways. As an absolute time in milliseconds and as a percentage.

      Parameters:
      timeMillis - milliseconds
      percent - percentage progress

    • setStatus

      void setStatus(int status)
      Notify playback status. Valid values are PLAY_START and PLAY_END
      Parameters:
      status - playback status
